WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Alarm
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Burning Hands
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Charm Person
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Color Spray
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Comprehend Languages
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Detect Magic
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Disguise Self
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Expeditious Retreat
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: False Life
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points for the duration.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Feather Fall
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Find Familiar
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Floating Disk
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: This spell creates a circular, horizontal plane of force, 3 feet in diameter and 1 inch thick.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Fog Cloud
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Grease
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Hideous Laughter
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: The creature of your choice that you can see within range perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Identify
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Illusory Script
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a potent illusion that lasts for the duration.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Jump
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Longstrider
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You touch a creature. The target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Mage Armor
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Magic Missile
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You create three glowing darts of magical force.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Protection from Evil and Good
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Shield
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Silent Image
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Sleep
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Thunderwave
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you.

WizardLevel1Spells.Name: Unseen Servant
WizardLevel1Spells.Description: This spell creates an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends.
